devfest18DetailsSmall: DevFest is a community-run developer event that focus on bridging together the community and Google’s technologies.

overviewSection.title: Workshops
overviewSection.des: Create a working prototype during the conference

overviewSection.title: Showcases
overviewSection.des: Check the latest of Google tech

overviewSection.title: Networking
overviewSection.des: Meet the people that with you build the industry

states.title: On the edge of Android, Web and Cloud.
states.des: Porto DevFest will bring the people who shape the future of Android, Web and Cloud technologies. Come and see for yourself how the experts use their skills to improve their day to day.

speakerSection.title: Some of the best and brightest in the industry
speakerSection.des: You'll be inspired, learn and have opportunity to talk to some of leading front experts in the community.

sessionsSection.title: Themes and Sessions
sessionsSection.des: These themes let you discover what's new about the cloud, product innovation, user research and languages.
